subject: Mental Health
title: Parenting Styles and Mental Health
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Parenting Styles and Mental Health.

hook.text: The way you parent predicts your child's anxiety levels more than their genes do.

buildup.text: Baumrind identified four styles: authoritative, authoritarian, permissive, and neglectful.

twist.text: Helicopter parenting, though well-intentioned, increases anxiety by preventing coping skill development.

climax.text: Children need enough challenge to build competence and enough safety to feel secure.

punchline.text: Good parenting isn't about removing all obstacles. It's about standing beside them.
